title: Infographic-Based Mathematics Education Design for Enhanced Visual Communication

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Mathematics Concepts and Basic Digital Device Operation Skills
context.additional_context: Modular learning content accessible via smartphones, designed to help professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields visually understand complex mathematical concepts and apply them to real-world tasks

learning_goals: Learners convert mathematical concepts (e.g., statistics, geometry) into visual representations using infographics with over 80% accuracy
Learners complete infographic projects incorporating peer feedback and submit deliverables applicable to real-world work scenarios
Learners achieve over 90% attainment of weekly learning objectives through 5-minute microlearning content in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
